text: How do you set the alt text for a featured image on a blog post? I'm drawing a blank
Our client is using the `{{ content.featured_image_alt_text }}` but the problem is there is no way to set this text on the front. so it shows like this when you look in dev info
looks like the main HubSpot blog has this issue as well
<@U2H3TT8F2> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U2H3TT8F2/F7KRQPELW/pasted_image_at_2017_10_16_10_58_am.png|Pasted image at 2017-10-16, 10:58 AM>

judging from the convo above, looks like its not possible. I'm going to ping Victoria (<@U5SGFUU80>) and see if this is something she might be able to point the PM of the HS Blog to as this is something that seems like it should be fixed.
The only thing I've done is place the page title as the featured image text
Yea that seems to be the best workaround at the moment.
same here

Just to hammer this further, (<@U22PU4G4A> maybe you might know someone who can make this change) our client has been going through the "Optimization" tab in their posts and that's where they are seeing the no alt text for images error. The image it refers to is the Featured Image. This seems like a constant error that will happen for alot of people. The customer claimed she was on the phone with support last week for an hour trying to find a resolution to this issue. This is what she see's
<@U2H3TT8F2> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U2H3TT8F2/F7JFX27RP/pasted_image_at_2017_10_16_12_44_pm.png|Pasted image at 2017-10-16, 12:44 PM>
What is the most translations that someone has added to a website on HubSpot? I am currently on 13 of 30 for ONE PAGE
<http://www.sciessent.com/hi/agion-antimicrobial-technology>
<http://www.sciessent.com/ar/agion-antimicrobial-technology>
<http://www.sciessent.com/de/agion-antimicrobial-technology>
<@U38EZFVFE> wow, that’s a lot of translations haha. #notjealous :joy:
That is including the CTAs.. RTL Languages are super hard.
cause doing the text in photoshop requires a special setting in photoshop and everything is just backwards.. Their right is on our left. it is so weird
I have to do the menues later.
oh man, I’ve never had to personally do the translations to any RTL languages…I would go so slowly
I wish you could clone menus
yep.. it is slow.
yeah man. that looks super ufn
fun
<@U38EZFVFE> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/U38EZFVFE/F7JKCESD7/screen_shot_2017-10-16_at_5.02.38_pm.jpg|Screen Shot 2017-10-16 at 5.02.38 PM.jpg>
Almost done
The most amusing one is the Ikea Translation
is there a toggle on the page to see them all?
I know HS has a module for one, just curious if you were styling that one for it
Yeah It does but I am not sure the client wants it.
The languages are for QR codes that they are adding to products that are using their Anti Microbial Products
They have products in all 32 countries
A file, which can't be shown because your team is past the free storage limit, was commented on.
Pro tip. If you have to translate images too... InDesign has a really good data merge functioon
